entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 03:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Periods of wet snow over higher terrain early this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
